functionDecorators.name: _computeCurrentPrice
functionDecorators.description: shamelessly stolen from the cryptokitties contract 0x06012c8cf97BEaD5deAe237070F9587f8E7A266d originally was going to be a more complicated auction. leaving here for future extensibility. Computes the current price of an auction. Factored out from _currentPrice so we can run extensive unit tests. When testing, make this function public and turn on `Current price computation` test suite.

functionDecorators.name: addParent
functionDecorators.description: Allows any parent to add additional parents. because 21st century.

functionDecorators.name: bid
functionDecorators.description: Kids can bid on some chores to do. Requires a 10% bond. price is calculated at current block change is calcualted and returned.

functionDecorators.name: certifyWork
functionDecorators.description: the parents have to sign off on the [sometimes] shoddy work that kids do will transfer bidAmount to the buyer and will return the excess (if any) to the certifier technically not correct. mom could run off with all of dads extra money, but I'll call it an incentive to sign off on chores completed. It kind of doesn't matter. dad was going to pay $20 for the dishes anyways.

functionDecorators.name: createAuction
functionDecorators.description: parents can start an auction. Creates and begins a new auction. price of auction is set to msg.value.

parameterDecorators.name: _chore
parameterDecorators.description: - The task to be completed for the winner.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentAuctionPrice
functionDecorators.description: price is calculated at current block.

functionDecorators.name: pauseContract
functionDecorators.description: Allows any Parent to pause the contract.

functionDecorators.name: revokeParenthood
functionDecorators.description: Allows any owner to revoke someone else.

parameterDecorators.name: revoked
parameterDecorators.description: The address to remove parenthood priviliges from the contract.

functionDecorators.name: rugPull
functionDecorators.description: Allows any Parent to rug pull if the contract is stopped.

functionDecorators.name: sweepExpiredAuction
functionDecorators.description: sweeps the money back out of expired chores that nobody did assumes onlyParents are a #team and share money and don't care if one sweeps vs another.

functionDecorators.name: togglePauseContract
functionDecorators.description: Allows any Parent to pause the contract.
